item.title: How to make your module compliant with PrestaShopâ€™s Official GDPR Compliance Module
item.description: Everybody must already know, there are a few steps to follow in order to make your module compliant with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) Add a consent confirmation checkbox if the module collects personal data Allow users to ask for total removal of their personal data Allow users to ask for a comprehensive export of their personal data owned by the site The Official GDPR Compliance Module by PrestaShop will be available soon, and it provides you with 4 new hooks to help you meet these requirements.
